about.title: A little about me
about.line1: Hi, I'm a web developer from Scotland with 6+ years experience.
about.line2: I have experience building web applications from enterprise-grade at JP Morgan to decentralized applications in DXdao and a degree in software development.
about.line3: I am currently a full time contributor to DXdao and project lead of DXgov, building Project-DAVI.
about.outOfJapan: I'm likely either in WET or JST timezones.

explanation.title: What am I currently doing?
explanation.explanation1: Currently I am focusing on DAO governance in web3.
explanation.explanation2: My role as a developer has evolved into project and product management but still doing architecture and contributing to the code is very rewarding.
explanation.explanation3: Working in a DAO can be a challenge but its the most fun I have had and most invested I have been in what we build.

1.title: Web apps
1.desc: Experience building complex web apps using react and typescript

2.title: Product & UX
2.desc: Overseeing product development with focus on creating unique UX.

3.title: DAO Governance
3.desc: Building and using on-chain governance systems.

5.title: Decentralization
5.desc: Building applications with proper decentralization at its core.
